name: Split Rock Grill
text: This is dining at its best. Relax in our terraced dining room for delicious breakfast selections, Saturday and Sunday from 7:30am to 11:00am and Monday through Friday 7:30am to 11:00am in the Rock Lounge. Or join us for dinner, Friday and Saturday from 5:00pm to 10:00pm and Sunday through Thursday from 5:00pm to 10:00pm in the Rock Lounge.
